Description: Papyrus (fourteen disassociated fragments; different late Hieratic hands); material from Tebtunis (Book of Nut). Purification ritual.
Curator's comments: To be published by F. Herbin, Late Religious Texts. 3 To be published by A. von Lieven
Being worked on by Andrea Kucharek (Heidelberg).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (102107) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/102107)
